name: Shenron Dragon
description:
Shenron (神龍シェンロン Shenron, lit. "Divine Dragon") is a magical Dragon from the Dragon Ball franchise. When Shenron is summoned, the sky becomes pitch dark, even during daytime. Whenever he is called he will arrive to grant one wish. Once he disappears, the sky returns to normal.
